Detailed Description

This class derives from PostProcessing::Phase, and provides a way to get a copy of the back buffer in a render target.

It does this by doing a StretchRect from the back buffer, which allows the card to resolve anti-aliasing at that time.

void PostProcessing::PyCopyBackBuffer::draw ( class Debug *  debug,
RECT *  rect = NULL 
) [virtual]

This method draws the PyCopyBackBuffer effect, by taking a copy of the currently set render target and stretchRecting it into our destination render target.

Parameters:
debug optional debug object to record the output of this phase.
rect optional debug rectangle in which to draw.

Implements PostProcessing::Phase.
